name: Name
description: The domain of the Final URL [`Domain`], with www. removed if present at the beginning

name: Initial URL
description: URL ingested to begin a scan

name: Initial Domain
description: Domain of the Initial URL

name: Initial Base Domain
description: Base Domain of the Initial URL

name: Initial Top Level Domain
description: Top Level Domain of the Initial URL

name: Redirect
description: Whether Name is different from the Initial Domain

name: URL
description: Final URL that resolves after any redirects, which is then scanned

name: Domain
description: Domain

name: Base Domain
description: Base Domain

name: Top Level Domain
description: Top Level Domain

name: Live
description: Whether the URL returns a 2** status code

name: Filter
description: Whether the Initial URL would be filtered out if suspected non-public/non-websites are filtered out

name: Status Code
description: HTTP status code

name: Media Type
description: Media type

name: Agency
description: Agency owner of the Initial Base Domain

name: Bureau
description: Bureau owner of the Initial Base Domain

name: Branch
description: Brach of government of the agency owner of the Initial Base Domain

name: 404 Test
description: Whether the Initial Domain return 404s correctly (TRUE) or gives a misleading 2** code (FALSE)

name: Data Source
description: Which source datasets included this Initial URL?

name: Scan Status - Date
description: Scan date/time (when data is written)

name: Scan Status - Primary
description: Status of the Primary Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]
queryable: yes, exact (from a set of specified values)

name: Scan Status - Accessibility
description: Status of the Accessibility Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - DNS
description: Status of the DNS Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Not Found
description: Status of the 404 Test Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Performance
description: Status of the Performance Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Robots.txt
description: Status of the Robots.txt Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Security
description: Status of the Security Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Sitemap.xml
description: Status of the Sitemap.xml Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - WWW
description: Status of the WWW Scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Homepage Hash
description: MD5 Hash of the URL

name: Accessibility - Violations
description: Count of violations detected for certain accessibility categories that are able to be detected through automated scanning. These violations were identified and selected in close coordination with the U.S. Access Board and GSAâ€™s Government-wide IT Accessibility Program. Site Scanning uses axe-core rules to detect these violations. Use of automated scanning for accessibility does not replace the need for manual testing or assessment.

name: Analytics - Pageviews
description: Combined pageviews over the last 30 days for this domain, per the Top Hostnames User Traffic Report on analytics.usa.gov

name: Analytics - Visits
description: Combined visits over the last 30 days for this domain, per the Top Hostnames User Traffic Report on analytics.usa.gov

name: DNS - IPv6
description: Presence of a DNS AAAA record

name: DNS - Hostname
description: Domain of underlying system, which often suggests use of a cloud or CDN provider

name: Infrastructure - CMS Provider
description: Content management system (currently Adobe, DNN, Drupal, Joomla, Sharepoint, Percussion, Silverstripe, Wordpress, Cloud.gov)

name: Infrastructure - Login Provider
description: Name of detected login service

name: Infrastructure - Login Detected
description: List of login indicators detected

name: Infrastructure - Site Search Detected
description: Is a site search functionality detected?

name: Infrastructure - Search.gov Detected
description: Is the use of Search.gov detected?

name: Infrastructure - DAP Detected
description: Is the Digital Analytics Program (DAP) tag detected?

name: Infrastructure - DAP Parameters
description: List of DAP parameters detected

name: Infrastructure - DAP Version
description: Version number of the DAP snippet

name: Infrastructure - Google Analytics Tag ID
description: Tag ID of any detected google analytics snippets

name: Infrastructure - Third Party Service Domains
description: List of distinct third party domains detected

name: Infrastructure - Third Party Service URLs
description: List of distinct third party urls detected

name: Infrastructure - Third Party Service Count
description: Count of distinct third party domains detected

name: Infrastructure - Cookie Domains
description: List of domains associated with each cookie sent by a server

name: Mobile - Viewport Meta Tag Detected
description: Is there a viewport meta tag in the <head>; does it contain a content attribute; does the content attribute's value contain the text 'width='?

name: Performance - Cumulative Layout Shift
description: Performance indicator that measures how much layouts shift for a user while the page loads for a user, expressed by a layout shift score

name: Performance - Largest Contentful Paint
description: Performance indicator that counts in milliseconds when what is likely the main content on the page loads

name: Required Links - URL
description: Presence of certain character strings in the URL of a hyperlink, suggesting a required link (per digital.gov/resources/required-web-content-and-links) or a link to a Spanish-language site or section

name: Required Links - Text
description: Presence of certain character strings in any hyperlinked text, suggesting a required link (per digital.gov/resources/required-web-content-and-links) or a link to a Spanish-language site or section

name: Security - HTTPS Required
description: Whether the Final URL enforces HTTPS

name: Security - HSTS Preloaded
description: Whether the Final URL domain is preloaded for HSTS

name: SEO - title
description: Meta page title

name: SEO - description
description: Meta page description

name: SEO - keywords
description: Meta page keywords

name: Open Graph - og:title
description: Open Graph page title

name: Open Graph - og:description
description: Open Graph description

name: Open Graph - article:published_time
description: Open Graph article published time

name: Open Graph - article:modified_time
description: Open Graph article modified time

name: Open Graph - og:image
description: Open Graph image link

name: Open Graph - og:type
description: Open Graph type tag

name: Open Graph - og:url
description: Open Graph object URL

name: Other Tags - Canonical Link
description: Canonical URL HTML element

name: Other Tags - Language
description: Meta language tag

name: Other Tags - Language Links
description: HTML link attributes for the langauge of linked pages

name: Other Tags - Main Element Detected
description: Presence of `<main>` element

name: Robots.txt - Detected
description: Is the `robots_txt_final_url` live (has a 2xx code) and is its entire path `/robots.txt`? (Note that a robots.txt file that redirects to a subdirectory would then not count given that the protocol appears to require that the file live in the top directory)

name: Robots.txt - Final URL
description: `Robots.txt` Final URL after redirects (301, 302, etc.)

name: Robots.txt - Final URL - Status Code
description: HTTP status code of the `robots.txt` Final URL

name: Robots.txt - Final URL - Media Type
description: Media type of the `robots.txt` Final URL

name: Robots.txt - Final URL - Filesize
description: Filesize of the `robots.txt` Final URL (bytes)

name: Robots.txt - Crawl Delay
description: `Robots.txt` specified crawl delay (seconds)

name: Robots.txt - Sitemap Locations
description: List of additional sitemap locations (URLs) found in the robots.txt (limited to 2,000 characters)

name: Sitemap.xml - Detected
description: Is the `sitemap_xml_final_url` live (has a 2xx code) and is its entire path `/sitemap.xml`?

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL
description: `Sitemap.xml` Final URL after redirects (301, 302, etc.)

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL - Status Code
description: HTTP status code of the `sitemap.xml` Final URL

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL - Media Type
description: Media type of the `sitemap.xml` Final URL

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL - Filesize
description: Filesize of the `sitemap.xml` Final URL (bytes)

name: Sitemap.xml - Items Count
description: Count of URLs in the detected `sitemap.xml`

name: Sitemap.xml - Last Modified
description: Most recent `Lastmod` value in the sitemap.xml file

name: Sitemap.xml - PDF Count
description: Count of URLs ending in `.pdf` in the detected `sitemap.xml`

name: Sitemap.xml - Hash
description: MD5 hash of the sitemap.xml file

name: USWDS - Favicon
description: Presence of USWDS favicon file (part of the standard header banner) in markup

name: USWDS - Favicon in CSS
description: Presence of USWDS favicon file (part of the standard header banner) in CSS

name: USWDS - Public Sans Font
description: Presence of Public Sans font files in CSS

name: USWDS - In-page CSS
description: Presence of '.usa-' class in a <style> block in HTML

name: USWDS - USA Class List
description: List of each '.usa-' class used (with any subclasses [i.e. underscores with ensuing text] stripped out)

name: USWDS - Here's How Link
description: Presence of the USWDS 'official website of the US government/Here's how you know' banner

name: USWDS - USA Classes
description: Presence of '.usa-' classes in CSS

name: USWDS - String
description: Presence of string `uswds` anywhere in HTML

name: USWDS - String in CSS
description: Presence of string `uswds` in CSS

name: USWDS - Semantic Version
description: USWDS semantic version

name: USWDS - Version
description: Presence of version of USWDS, if available

name: USWDS - Count
description: Calculated likelihood a site is using USWDS. Derived by adding the detected USWDS components together, the higher the number the more USWDS-y it is.

name: WWW - URL
description: Final URL that resolves when `www.` is added to the begining of the Initial URL

name: WWW - Status Code
description: HTTP status code when `www.` is added to the begining of the Initial URL

name: WWW - Title
description: Meta page title when `www.` is added to the begining of the Initial URL
